spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent overall room layout and adjacency. Dimensional scaling is well-preserved. Minor deductions for the laundry/bathroom door orientation and slight compression of the pantry area compared to the master ensuite alignment.

structural_fidelity.notes: The model successfully removes the roof and correctly places all major rooms. It follows the background and UI constraints perfectly (no text, dark background). A small deduction for slight reinterpretation of the garage entry wall depth.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture such as the kitchen island, beds, and living room set are accurately mapped. The Alfresco dining area and the double desk in the Study are correctly represented in block-style.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High adherence to the low-poly style with flat shading. The lighting is soft and ambient without being photorealistic. The camera angle is a consistent isometric orthographic view.

detected_errors.description: Minor door swing orientation mismatch in the laundry and wet areas compared to the 2D plan.
The refrigerator in the kitchen is rendered as a standalone silver block, whereas the plan shows a recessed cabinet alcove.
